text: Mark Hall is an American mixed martial artist and amateur kickboxer who competed in the Light heavyweight division. Hall is most famous for his 42 second stoppage of the 390lb Sumo World Champion, Koji Kitao at UFC 9. Hall is also known for his bouts against Don Frye at UFC: Ultimate Ultimate 1996, UFC: The U Japan 1996 and UFC 10. ==Championships and Accomplishments== *International Vale Tudo Championship **IVC 2 Tournament Semifinalist *Ultimate Fighting Championship **UFC 7 Tournament Semifinalist **UFC Ultimate Ultimate 1996 Tournament Semifinalist *Founder of Cobra Fighting Federation *In 1998, Mark hosted the very first legal MMA event in California, at the Stampede in Temecula, CA *Hosted the very first MMA event held on Indian Reservation in the state of California.
